O

Order - Class in assignment
An order consists of the details of all the items that have been ordered, the number of items in the order, the staff who created the order, the table no of where customers were seated at, the discount which is to be given to the customer, and the total amount of the order.
Order() - Constructor for class assignment.Order
Creates an empty object of class Order.
Order(OrderItem[], Date, int, int, String, float) - Constructor for class assignment.Order
Creates an object of class Order when the parameters are specified.
order - Variable in class assignment.OrderFile
 
orderedItems - Variable in class assignment.Order
 
OrderFile - Class in assignment
Inherited base class of ReservationFile, which adds items in an order, removes an item from the order, prints the current order details, prints the order invoice, and adds the details on the text file.
OrderFile() - Constructor for class assignment.OrderFile
 
OrderFile(String, int, int, int, String, float) - Constructor for class assignment.OrderFile
 
OrderItem - Class in assignment
Contains the details of menu item which has been ordered, namely name, description, price and exist (a variable which tells whether the particular item exists in the menu or not).
OrderItem() - Constructor for class assignment.OrderItem
 
OrderItem(String, String, boolean, float) - Constructor for class assignment.OrderItem
